https://78.media.tumblr.com/7e19014aa977a1a8e66790309c59c301/tumblr_nlmg6gmiKx1qho2rco2_500.gif

When we make a purchasable item, by default it shows up in all items as well as search. If we had to add them explicitly to search / all items, we'd forget to do it and it'd be more annoying.

Hiding things from 'All items' has come up before (enchantments), so we've had that option for awhile. Broken Stopwatch is the first technically purchasable item that we've needed to hide from both search AND all items. So, we just haven't built the thing to hide it from search yet.

Would you perhaps say that this is on your "watchlist"?

The blocks in the script represent just that, this is noticeable if you imagine different champion being played. 
How are minion and champion interactions balanced, relative to minion AI, (balanced) by stats, over time? And i mean all kinds of stats.
